name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned PL/SQL Developer with 8+ years of software engineering experience, I possess advanced skills in **PL/SQL**, **Oracle database**, and **Oracle SQL Developer**. My expertise in developing calculation engines, stored procedures, and packages enables me to create high-quality solutions tailored to HR products. I am proficient in ensuring coding standards and best practices to maintain system integrity. Additionally, I have strong analytical and problem-solving skills to overcome challenges effectively. My ability to communicate fluently in both **Italian** and **English** enhances collaboration within diverse teams. I am dedicated to optimizing workflow orchestration to drive efficiency and performance.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized analytical skills to develop and maintain complex **PL/SQL** stored procedures and packages in **Oracle Database** to ensure robust data processing and calculation engines for HR Products.
Implemented coding standards and best practices in SQL Development using **Oracle SQL Developer** and **TOAD** for optimized data manipulation and reporting.
Conducted thorough problem-solving sessions to troubleshoot and enhance existing workflows, leveraging **workflow orchestration** techniques in conjunction with **Oracle Database** capabilities.
Engaged in continuous improvement initiatives to streamline data operations and enhance system performance by **15%** within **6 months**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement secure and efficient data access methodologies across varied applications.
Mentored junior developers on best practices in **PL/SQL** coding standards and effective use of tools like **TOAD** and **Oracle SQL Developer**.
Facilitated comprehensive testing and validation of stored procedures and packages, ensuring reliable outputs and adherence to HR compliance standards.
Provided bilingual support in **Italian** and **English** for international teams to enhance communication and expedite project development cycles.
Participated in code reviews to uphold quality standards and ensure optimal performance of all **PL/SQL** scripts across projects.
Assisted in the creation and execution of documentation processes related to emerging standards in **workflow orchestration** and database management.

Utilized **PL/SQL** for the development and management of complex **Oracle databases**, enhancing performance and reliability through optimized stored procedures and packages.
Leveraged **Oracle SQL Developer** and **TOAD** to efficiently design and maintain coding standards, ensuring adherence to best practices across database development projects.
Developed and implemented calculation engines in **PL/SQL**, effectively streamlining calculations and improving processing time by **30%**.
Created and maintained workflow orchestration processes to automate data handling, achieving a **25%** reduction in operational downtime.
Applied analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve database issues, improving application performance and user experience in HR products by **20%**.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities when optimizing existing database processes, resulting in improved data retrieval times and system responsiveness.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements for HR product improvements, effectively communicating in both **Italian** and **English** to facilitate discussions.
Conducted reviews of coding standards and best practices, providing mentorship and guidance to junior developers on **PL/SQL** development techniques.
Implemented robust testing protocols for **Stored Procedures** and packages to ensure reliability and performance, reducing error rates by **15%**.
Integrated workflow automation solutions into existing systems, enhancing the efficiency of HR operations and reducing manual intervention by **40%**.

Utilized **PL/SQL** to develop and optimize stored procedures and packages, improving query performance for high-load HR product applications.
Designed and implemented calculation engines leveraging **Oracle database** capabilities to enhance data processing and reporting accuracy.
Collaborated with team members to maintain coding standards and best practices, ensuring high-quality, maintainable code in line with project requirements.
Performed workflow orchestration, enabling automated data flows and processes across HR products, achieving a reduction in manual intervention by **30%**.
Conducted thorough analytical assessments to diagnose and resolve data management issues, employing strong problem-solving skills to enhance system performance.
Produced high-quality documentation and technical specifications using **Oracle SQL Developer** and **TOAD**, enabling streamlined development and training processes.
Assured the integrity and security of data resources, adhering to established coding standards and best practices to maintain software reliability.
Maintained fluency in **Italian** and **English** to facilitate effective communication with diverse teams and stakeholders in multilanguage environments.
Leveraged strong analytical skills to conduct data validation and performance testing, ensuring alignment with business objectives and enhancing user experience.
Actively participated in code reviews, promoting adherence to coding standards and sharing insights on optimizing PL/SQL runtime efficiency.
